Function reference

All functions

add_dose()
Add dose tally to table
add_histories()
Add history labels to table
assessBalance()
Assesses confounder balancing
calcBalStats()
Calculate balance stats based on Jackson paper
compareHistories()
Estimate, compare, and visualize exposure histories
createFormulas()
Create balancing formulas
createWeights()
Creates IPTW balancing weights
create_custom_comparisons()
Creates custom comparisons
create_custom_contrasts()
Create custom contrasts
eval_hist()
Visualize distribution of sample across exposure histories
fitModel()
Fit outcome model
getModel()
Fits outcome model
get_comparison_values()
Finds custom comparison values
get_reference_values()
Finds custom reference values
make_love_plot()
Create love plots showing balancing statistics
perform_multiple_comparison_correction()
Conduct multiple comparison correction
trimWeights()
Trim IPTW balancing weights
